comments.body: I would say that making a overloading would make for a more safe and readable alternative than using an `Option` with a default.
Tried that but it collides with the other overload of `constant`. I'd have to pick a new name, and I didn't want to because I am lazy and couldn't think of one. (If you have one, please shout.)
We're using it only in one place, I guess it's fine like it is then. Thanks.
